name: New York Duotone Illustration Free Set
description:
About New York:

New York is a 3 set series in Streamline's illustration library. It has 285+ illustrations in Monoline, Duotone and Colors. There are over 20 categories such as Work, Design, Development, Interface and more.


About Streamline

For 12 years, Streamline has made the world's largest and most comprehensive icon, illustration and emoji sets. Some of the world's best designers like Tobias Van Schneider, Khoi Vinh, recommend Streamline. Our app is used by 100,000 creators each month! Even our friends at Figma recommend Streamline :)


Features

  1. Use 24,000+ illustrations in Figma via our plugin or via our web app to search faster.
  2. Use the global color editor in our app to change colors at once (HEX, CSS, and RGB).
  3. Precise resizing in our app or free figma plugin. Free users can export all 24,000 illustrations up to 400 px.


License

  • Use in unlimited personal and professional projects.
  • Max of 50 illustrations allowed per project.
  • Free with attribution. Premium without attribution.
  • Use in templates, web apps, mobile apps, presentation design and even logos!


Upcoming sets

Want to sign up for our future sets? 100k people have joined our email list. You can join too -> email list.
